English only.
Students must complete the assigned homework before each class.

Setting Goals (SMART Goals)

第3回: How do businesses communicate with us?: Ways of seeing advertising

1-2 hours  Prepare for presentation of ad campaign

第8回: How do businesses communicate with each other?:  Communication issues in an international company
第9回: How do businesses communicate with each other?:  Daily social communication with coworkers
第10回: How do we communicate with businesses?:  Selling yourself & Personal Branding
第11回: How do we communicate with businesses?:  Researching company needs
